aboutme: Hello, I'm Jose, a passionate full-stack developer who loves turning ideas into real-world applications. My programming journey began in high school when I joined the Robotics Club, where I was inspired by innovative thinkers solving complex problems. This drive led me to pursue Computer Science at SFSU, immersing myself in a field that constantly evolves and shapes the future. My goal is to write clean, efficient, and scalable code that powers intuitive and impactful products. I thrive on challenges, embrace new technologies, and am always looking to push boundaries in software development.

projects.title: Clashvote
projects.skills: Reac.js, Express.js, Sass, Git, VS Code
projects.summary: Clashvote is a voting website where players vote on various aspects on the popular mobile game Clash of Clans, helping players of any skill level. Users also have the ability to search their own player stats, giving them insight on what their strength and weaknesses are as well as providing them a better overview on both their bases and their respective armies.

projects.title: ReadAI
projects.summary: With my strong growing interest of reading, I decided to make an app that lets you search for information on a book or get recommendations for books on certain genres utilizing AI. ReadAI takes an displays the information of a given ISBN or a random ISBN given a genre and displays rudimentary information on the book but most importantly gives the user an AI generated summarization of the book.

projects.title: Clash Attack Finder
projects.summary: My Clash of Clans Attack Finder is designed to eliminate the grind and maximize efficiency. By automating finding attackable bases, it helps players save time, letting users run this program while shifting their attention to anything else. Once a base is found that meets the players minimum loot threshold they will then be notified. This tool streamlines actions that would otherwise take hours, allowing players to focus on other activities instead of repeatedly pressing 'Next' to find the right base.

projects.title: Tank Game
projects.summary: As both a gamer and a programmer, I naturally found myself creating a game. The game features two Space Tanks, with the ability to shoot, traverse amongst the map, be able to pick up abilities as well as play alongside your best friend.

projects.title: Nature Share
projects.skills: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Node.js, Express.js, MySQL, Git, VS Code

projects.title: GatorMarket
projects.skills: HTML, CSS, Javascript, MySQL, VS Code
